content.prompt: If rural-to-urban migration continues in China, which of the following outcomes is most likely?

choices.label: Housing shortages in urban areas will be common.
Schools in rural areas will not have enough students to remain open.
Manufacturing areas will face labor shortages.
Wages will increase in urban areas.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain a likely outcome in a geographic scenario using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
